-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Support for modifying record fields of monoidal type
--   
--   Small module with utility function and class for modifying record
--   fields of a monoidal type.
@package monoid-record
@version 0.1

module Data.Monoid.Record
add :: Monoid m => (a -> m) -> (m -> a -> a) -> m -> a -> a
class Monoid m => Wrapper m a | m -> a
wrap :: Wrapper m a => a -> m
addP :: Wrapper m a => (b -> m) -> (m -> b -> b) -> a -> b -> b
instance Wrapper [a] [a]
instance Wrapper (Last a) a
instance Wrapper Any Bool
